post_text: Congratulations to Annie Bravo who was selected as a Riverside County Educator of the Year. Mrs. Bravo is a 3rd grade teacher at Railway Elementary and has been with the district for 17 years. She is one of four educators in Riverside County to receive the award this year.

post_text: Although the next two weeks are the District's regularly scheduled Spring Break, students can still receive grab and go meals. Grab and go meals are available at Perris and Good Hope on Monday and Wednesday this week; and Monday, Wednesday, and Friday next week from 10:30-11:30.

post_text: Calling all poets. The Riverside County Office of Education announced a virtual student art competition, with different themes for each week. This week's theme is Expressions of Change, and the medium is poetry. For more information visit https://www.rcoe.us/art-connects/

post_text: In light of the recent update extending school closures through April 30, we will be extending our Grab and Go lunches through that time.
text: In light of the recent update extending school closures through April 30, we will be extending our Grab and Go lunches through that time.

post_text: Perris ESD will be closed Mar. 16th - Apr. 30th. The soonest our students will return to school is May 1st. To-go lunches will be provided for children 18 years and younger, beginning Mar. 19th - Apr. 30th, from 10:30 to 11:30 am at Perris and Good Hope Elementary Schools.
text: Perris ESD will be closed Mar. 16th - Apr. 30th. The soonest our students will return to school is May 1st. To-go lunches will be provided for children 18 years and younger, beginning Mar. 19th - Apr. 30th, from 10:30 to 11:30 am at Perris and Good Hope Elementary Schools.

post_text: During our District closure, school lunches will be made available to all PESD students beginning Thursday, March 19. Lunches will be available at Good Hope Elementary and Perris Elementary from 10:30-11:30 a.m.
text: During our District closure, school lunches will be made available to all PESD students beginning Thursday, March 19. Lunches will be available at Good Hope Elementary and Perris Elementary from 10:30-11:30 a.m.

post_text: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, schools will be closed March 16-April 3. The District office will resume regular business hours Monday, April 6. Students and teachers will return on Monday, April 20 following Spring Break. Please see our website for more details.
